name: Candy Tapping
description:
Tapping the screen to pop as many candies as you can. Avoid the bombs or it's game over. Gear up for this exciting and addictive game and don't forget to rate us in the App Store.

Very cute graphics
Survival mode
Time mode
High quality sound effects
Game Center leaderboards
Candies will be thrown from four sides with different speed
Realistic physics: free falling, projectile motions
Stress relief
Improve your reflex speed
